trans-unit.source: Represents a pager field item in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示中的页导航字段项<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the DataPagerFieldItem class is created to hold the pager controls in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: DataPagerFieldItem 类的实例创建来保存中的页导航控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer> interface is a marker that indicates that the container control represented by the DataPagerFieldItem class is part of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object's control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>接口是一个标记，指示由 DataPagerFieldItem 类表示的容器控件是否属于<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>对象的控件层次结构。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>

trans-unit.source: The DataPagerFieldItem class is typically used in the handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.PagerCommand> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField> object.
trans-unit.target: 处理程序中通常使用 DataPagerFieldItem 类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.PagerCommand>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.PagerCommand>

trans-unit.source: It is used to access controls inside the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField> object and to access the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: 它用于访问内的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField>对象和访问的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerCommandEventArgs.Item%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property represents the pager field item.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem"></xref> class.
The pager control that contains the pager field object.
trans-unit.target: 包含页导航字段对象的页导航控件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the event for the server control is passed up the page's UI server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否沿页的 UI 服务器控件层次结构向上传递服务器控件的事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event was sent to the parent control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果事件已发送到父控件中;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the pager control that contains the pager field object.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含页导航字段对象的页导航控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the Pager property to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
This property is typically used to access the properties of the control in an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.PagerCommand?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 此属性通常用于访问控件的事件处理程序中的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.PagerCommand?displayProperty=fullName>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.PagerCommand?displayProperty=fullName>
